name: Faroe v1.3.0
body:
[Various changes](https://github.com/52North/faroe/compare/v1.2.0...v1.3.0)

This release is available on Maven Central:

```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.n52.faroe</groupId>
    <artifactId>faroe</artifactId>
    <version>1.3.0</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.n52.faroe</groupId>
    <artifactId>faroe-json</artifactId>
    <version>1.3.0</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.n52.faroe</groupId>
    <artifactId>faroe-annotations</artifactId>
    <version>1.3.0</version>
</dependency>
<dependency>
    <groupId>org.n52.faroe</groupId>
    <artifactId>faroe-utils</artifactId>
    <version>1.3.0</version>
</dependency>
```
